name: zuswap
description: ## Workflow Idea 1 ## * Users -do not- need to log in * Users can view requests   * If they want to accept one, they need to send email to CCTimeOffRequest and cc their supervisor and the requester * Admin can log in to view pending requests and delete ones that have been approved, or ones that have already passed * Pros   * Doesn't involve users having to create a login and remember a password   * Doesn't involve a dev team having to connect app to existing single sign-on   * Much quicker to produce, more stable   * Users cannot go in and accidentally delete requests - all control is in the admin's hands * Cons   * Less control as a user   * Less automated functionality
author: Benjamin Stepp
